keyMoments.title: Reveals Possession of Pluton Blueprints
keyMoments.description: Franky shocks everyone by revealing that he has been carrying the blueprints to the ancient weapon Pluton inside his cyborg body the entire time.
keyMoments.significance: Explains why Franky has been targeted by CP9 and establishes the enormous stakes of the current conflict.
keyMoments.quote: The blueprints you've been searching for all this time... they're right here!

keyMoments.title: Acknowledges Robin's True Character
keyMoments.description: Franky tells Robin that he misjudged her based on rumors and now understands she would never abuse the ancient weapons.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's growth and marks a turning point in his relationship with the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: I know now... you're not the kind of person who would abuse the Pluton.

keyMoments.title: Burns the Pluton Blueprints
keyMoments.description: Franky uses his Fresh Fire ability to burn the Pluton blueprints to ashes, betting everything on the Straw Hats' ability to rescue Robin.
keyMoments.significance: This irreversible decision destroys the only known blueprints to an ancient weapon and marks Franky's spiritual joining of the crew. It ends CP9's five-year mission in failure.
keyMoments.quote: If Nico Robin is to be taken by you now, the world will end. But if the Straw Hats win, what you'll have left is absolutely nothing at all. Personally, I'm betting on their victory!

abilities.description: Franky uses his cyborg body to produce fire, which he uses to burn the Pluton blueprints.

relationships.description: Franky acknowledges Robin's true character and places his faith in her and the Straw Hats.

evolutionMoments.description: Franky apologizes to Robin for misjudging her and burns the Pluton blueprints, betting on the Straw Hats to save her.

relationships.description: Franky places complete faith in Luffy and the Straw Hat Pirates to rescue Robin.

evolutionMoments.description: Franky bets everything on the Straw Hats' victory, demonstrating his trust in Luffy's crew.

reveals.information: Has been carrying the Pluton blueprints inside his cyborg body
Believes Robin would never abuse the power of ancient weapons

keyMoments.title: Witnesses the Destruction of His Five-Year Mission
keyMoments.description: Spandam loses his composure completely after witnessing Franky burn the Pluton blueprints, realizing that CP9's five-year infiltration mission has ended in complete failure.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the enormous resources the World Government invested in acquiring the blueprints, all undone by Franky's single act of defiance.
keyMoments.quote: It's burnt to a crisp! Damn it! I'm gonna kill you!

keyMoments.title: Uses Kaitai Buttagiri Technique
keyMoments.description: Zambai uses his technique called 'Kaitai Buttagiri' during the battle at Enies Lobby.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Franky Family's contribution to the rescue mission and their fighting capabilities.

abilities.description: A dismantling technique used by Zambai in combat.
